item.title: Cooperate for Open Report
item.description: We are delighted to present the results of our Cooperate for Open feasibility study. The full report is available for download here: http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.4795689 In early 2020, Libraria received support from a group of U.S. research libraries to pursue a feasibility study for the Cooperate for Open project. The project, which focused on born-OA, diamond OA, and/or scholar-led open access publications in anthropology and adjacent fields, aimed to identify a model for sustaining these publications, while reducing the risk and workload often associated with this segment of the publishing landscape.
